favourite.article: Praise the Lord! Let us Always rejoice, whatever may happen, pray unceasingly...
Praise the Lord!! Always rejoice in whatever situation we may be in!! In everything give thanks!!
Such an inspiring song, God is great.
Amen...for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus for you...
I love this song I truly do. I love You Lord hope You'll take care of him, now that I am not in his side. Love You, Lord.
I love all songs in hymnal and praise the Lord.
For this is the will of God in Christ Jesus. What a will! Rejoicing, praying, and praising!
Amen. Unceasingly we pray, rejoicing and giving thanks to Him keeps our spirit alive for the building up His dwelling place. Amen.
